title: DynHost
description: Configure dynamic DNS for your domain.

records.title: DynHost records
records.emptyHint: Add a DynHost record to enable dynamic DNS.

logins.title: DynHost logins
logins.emptyHint: Create a login to update DynHost records.

delete.title: Delete DynHost record
delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this DynHost record?

loginAdd.title: Add login
loginAdd.description: Create a login to update DynHost records.
loginAdd.info: This login can be used with any DynDNS compatible client.
loginAdd.subdomainsHelp: Select which subdomains this login can update

loginEdit.title: Edit login
loginEdit.passwordHint: Leave empty to keep current password
loginEdit.errorPasswordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

loginDelete.title: Delete login
loginDelete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete login {{login}}?
loginDelete.warning: This action is irreversible. DynHost updates using this login will no longer work.

info.title: How to use DynHost
info.description: DynHost allows you to point a subdomain to a dynamic IP address. Use a DynHost client to automatically update your IP.
